# Touch-Function Gestures

Assign roles to touch-function gestures (T-Fn1, T-Fn2, T-Fn3, or T-Fn4) for quick access to selected features.

> ðŸ’¡ **Note:**  
> Touch-function gestures are disabled by default. To enable touch-function gestures, select **ON** for **BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > TOUCH SCREEN SETTING > TOUCH FUNCTION**.

## Touch-Function Gesture Defaults

The default assignments for the different gestures are:

!Touch-Function Gestures

| Touch-Function Gestures | Default         |
|-------------------------|-----------------|
| T-Fn1 (flick up)        | HISTOGRAM       |
| T-Fn2 (flick left)      | FILM SIMULATION |
| T-Fn3 (flick right)     | WHITE BALANCE   |
| T-Fn4 (flick down)      | SHUTTER TYPE    |
